text: Linda Edna Cardellini (born June 25, 1975) is an American actress. She is known for playing Lindsay Weir on Freaks and Geeks (1999–2000), Samantha Taggart on ER (2003–09), and Meg Rayburn on Bloodline (2015–17). Cardellini is also known for her role as Velma Dinkley in the Scooby-Doo live-action movie series (2002–04). Cardellini's voice work includes CJ from Regular Show, Wendy from Gravity Falls, and Megan from Sanjay and Craig. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:American video game actors Category:Actors from San Mateo County, California
title: Linda Cardellini
